data.eml:eml: Two new species of the ant genus Acanthomyrmex Emery, 1893 (Hymenoptera, Formicidae, Myrmicinae) from Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jaitrong, Weeyawat, Asanok, Lamthai (2019): Two new species of the ant genus Acanthomyrmex Emery, 1893 (Hymenoptera, Formicidae, Myrmicinae) from Thailand. ZooKeys 842: 113-134, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.842.33609, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.842.33609
